title: New Chairman appointed to Board of Sri J’pura Teaching Hospital
content: Former Secretary of the Education Ministry, Nimal Bandara was appointed as the new Chairman to the Board of the Sri Jayawardenapura Teaching Hospital, by Health Minister Maithripala Sirisena a short while ago. Additional Secretary of the Health Ministry, Dr. Palitha Mahipala, was appointed as a member of the Board. Other members of the 12 member…
